website_summaries.verdict: These 1 oz. throwing knives are better designed for stealthy ninjitsu use than competitive target throwing, but they definitely have the "cool" factor.
pros: Very lightweight, easy to carry and conceal
All 6 blades fit securely in wrist sheath
cons: Knives could be bowed or curved

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: These are good knives, I would make sure that you have a knife sharpening tool in order to keep them in great condition. All in all, they are not my top of the line knife, they work and fly well. Mine did bend after 100 tosses or so but nothing that a quick fix and some sharpening could not fix. The only reason I gave a 4 star and not a 5 is because they bent a bit easier then I thought they might. But hell for the price tag these are good knives to practice with.
customer_reviews.author: JWillTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: 6 Stars
customer_reviews.text: I throw for about an hour a day. Inside, at a dart board. I LOVE these knives. I have been throwing for 3 years. I've thrown dozens of different blades. For the price, you WILL not find a better set of throwing knives! I intend on purchasing again from this company in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Ty9078

customer_reviews.title: Really small, cheaply made, wrist sheath doesn’t stay on.
customer_reviews.text: The knives were a lot smaller than I thought they would be. The knives are also really light and have moderate balance. The sleeve is horrible, cheap, does not fit well, and was just junk. They were a gift for my best friend new boy friend but I was too embarrassed to give it to him. A furit cake was a better gift than these.
customer_reviews.author: Drea R.

customer_reviews.title: Good beginners knives
customer_reviews.text: Very good knives for the price, very well balanced and well made, this is my own first set of throwing knives and I like them a lot, I'm giving 4 stars because it doesn't seem like the knives were very sharp upon arrival, again I am a beginner to throwing so it may not matter, but I do recommend buying these!
customer_reviews.author: Keith N.

customer_reviews.title: Blades for days
customer_reviews.text: A little dull at first in my opinion but still when through wood fine they are light wait and easy to transport but I don't know where I would put them besides getting the strap on my arms and I couldn't get it around my leg or waist but the blades themselves are really good and durable
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Brown

customer_reviews.title: Fair price for six throwing knives
customer_reviews.text: These were fine for my son but one of the six knives was actually rusted and the coating was bubbled on both sides. I also had to grind two knife points because the ends were flat but after I cleaned and sharpened them they worked fine. -Robert Fayetteville NC
customer_reviews.author: Robert Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Trippy sticks
customer_reviews.text: Clean then a MF. Perfection as far as throwing is concerned
customer_reviews.author: Winston Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good for practice
customer_reviews.text: Balance is not that great but they are tough. Good for practice.
customer_reviews.author: Jigmaster

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: They are well weighted, good quality, and and good quantity. The only issue is that the paint of the spider is a little faded but no biggy. Youre there for the knife not the paint. I love them good job UCT
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: But I Love These.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the wrong set, was looking to get The Expendables 12" throwing knives, but, I ordered the wrong ones. Still going to get the Expendables Set, But I Love These.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher B.

customer_reviews.title: Not a quality set of knives
customer_reviews.text: The knives were not uniform in the least, there were small differences in the tips and shafts. They fly fine and stick in fine but are extremely light weight, not great for beginners as they are very small compared to standard sized throwing knives. I am shocked that they cost as much as they do considering how cheap they look and feel. Also, mine did not come with the advertised black nylon wrist sheath. Just an annoying zipper pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: good for the price
customer_reviews.text: the product is good for the price and i use it for some projects in robotics but they are not that accurate like a well balanced knife, i got others which work best but yeah overall they are really good and concealed
customer_reviews.author: MIGUEL P.

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set!
customer_reviews.text: "Thank you for your product. We bought these for my son for Christmas because he wanted to get into throwing. He was very excited about them and really likes them. We appreciate your family business and being able to support that. We will refer friends and family to you if they ever are interested and we will be back for future purchases. "
customer_reviews.author: Jilean Ercanbrack

customer_reviews.title: Very well made knives
customer_reviews.text: Very well made knives looking forward to having a pleasant time throwing them. Excellent service from the start. Nice company to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: Herbie l

customer_reviews.title: These are a great size and are easy to throw
customer_reviews.text: These are a great size and are easy to throw. The customer service is amazing and we loves the video they provided as well.
customer_reviews.author: ElizaMDamstedt

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: "I ordered these knives for my brother and they arrived very quickly, which was awesome. He loves them as well! They are basically his new favorite thing. I'll definitely be buying more in the future. Thanks for the great product!"
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Nice throwing knives
customer_reviews.text: These knives are nice! They work great for indoor throwing. Im going to get another set.
customer_reviews.author: Allan Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Magnificent, but dull
customer_reviews.text: They were great, but the only problem my son had with them was that not one of them came with a sharp point, as you can see in the photo, they were actually quite dull tipped, but they are good for the money, very durable
customer_reviews.author: Susan C.

customer_reviews.title: They're made with surgical steel extremely Sharp in all situations handled with caution
customer_reviews.text: Nice throwing knives and the warning is very accurate I was very careful using them but you do have to really be alert at all times but very nice kit.
customer_reviews.author: Earl M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: These knives are of good quality and hold up very well. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: prompt shipping, smaller than I thought but should be fine
customer_reviews.author: RoseAnn Lauer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these knives. i have been throwing them every day since i got them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fraudsters
customer_reviews.text: This was all just a bunch of crap and whoever's sold this there site is a joke they just mislead and say anything to make a sale . If I could give negative stars I would .
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave these to my brother for Christmas, and he told me it's the best gift he's gotten in years. He's really enjoying them!
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: I bought these knives for my son who became interested ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these knives for my son who became interested in throwing knives after a couple of activities with his Boy Scouts of America troop. He was really excited and said they work well.
customer_reviews.author: kel

customer_reviews.title: Great throwing knife set for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Great knives for teaching my oldest son. Well made with good balance.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Knowing what I was buying I'm not dumb enough to rate anything less than I have. There are very difficult to throw. They are small and light, not a good combination for throwing. Challenging to throw and takes time to get the hang of it. Like a lot of time! They have stayed sharp and have a nice finish. Sheath is nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: Most of these arrived with blunted tips
customer_reviews.text: Not even close to sharp with blunted tips. Good thing I have a decent set of stones.
customer_reviews.author: Nate Wilkes

customer_reviews.title: Missed opportunities
customer_reviews.text: Was supposed to be a free gift but did not see o had to hit another button so I missed out. As for the necklace. The wife wanted it and says she likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Advertised saying with wrist sheath but only thing I received was a zip up booklet with 6 throwing knives. Definitely not as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J.

customer_reviews.title: Throwing knives
customer_reviews.text: Inspected all of the knives: They show signs of damaged spots on the cutting edges and feathered edge burs. They are not flat and have a bow... that will change the way they fly. Lay them on something flat with light on the other side, then flip them over. If you see light under them... they are not flat. The edges can be resharpened... but the bend/bow? I don't know... These are manufacturers defects. I would think competition knives as they are advertised is not what they are. This is the way I will have to review them.
customer_reviews.author: S. Paczer

customer_reviews.title: and my grandson loved them. they were as described and shipped in ...
customer_reviews.text: they seem well made, and my grandson loved them. they were as described and shipped in the time allotted
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in the quality for what I spent
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap looking and feeling. I bought this product for my son but will have to buy other ones that are up to par. Very disappointed in the quality for what I spent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We are enjoying throwing these knives.  Haven't broken one yet.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Only problem is we have lost 2 because they have gone into the ground under the grass and we can't find them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: but still good. Definitely fun to throw
customer_reviews.text: Very short and light, but still good. Definitely fun to throw, but nothing serious.
customer_reviews.author: Brock

customer_reviews.title: They're small and light which makes it difficult use a ...
customer_reviews.text: They're small and light which makes it difficult use a traditional throw. Laying it on your palm and using a no spin side throw works well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice size, but not quit as heavy as I'd like
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Keith Green

customer_reviews.title: Balanced and well made
customer_reviews.text: Nice set of well balanced throwing knives. Small but not too small. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Vidrine

customer_reviews.title: So so.
customer_reviews.text: These are weighted fairly well, but the knives themselves are not very durable. These get burs very easily even in very soft wood.
customer_reviews.author: Ed M.

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality knives.
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping decent quality knives. I few odd spots throughout the metal but overall quality and shipping was satisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Super cool, and sharp. Got them as a gift for my old man. He likes all things ninja and I know he will love these.
customer_reviews.author: BH

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend for beginners only!
customer_reviews.text: These knives are for beginners. Steel is thin and bends easily. Very sharp and very light weight
customer_reviews.author: Nicolette

customer_reviews.title: Great follow through from the vendor
customer_reviews.text: Great follow through from the vendor. My son loves the knives and has spent hours using them and they are holding up great!
customer_reviews.author: Martha Weld

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: NOT professional grade by any means, good enough to start throwing and sure theyre balanced but thats hard to tell with how light they are. I needed to sharpen the ponts before they would stick in anything and they feel like theyd break if you threw em at any kind of hard wood
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not too shabby
customer_reviews.text: Fun to throw but not as sharp as I was hoping. Sharp point but not the edges
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I have received the throwing knives but have yet to try them. I did have a chance to look them over and I am very pleased with the look and feel of the knives. I hope to have an opportunity to use them soon. Thank you again.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as it says
customer_reviews.text: This product displeased me very much, some of my knives where bent and disfigured. The knife summery roped me in making it think it was very good, but they didn't meet my expectations!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price!
customer_reviews.text: As expected and matched description when ordering. Good quality, Nicly packaged!
customer_reviews.author: B. Buck

customer_reviews.title: Really tiny. More like throwing spikes
customer_reviews.text: only really suitable for very close practice. Check the size before you order.
customer_reviews.author: BK

product_meta.title: Under Control Tactical Best Throwing Knives for Competition - Includes Pack of 6 with Case - Kunai Knife Set for Martial Arts Ninjas
product_meta.description:
ATTENTION: If You're Looking for the ULTIMATE Throwing Knives for Martial Arts & Competition Use, Then You've Found It! 

Without a doubt, the ORIGINAL Under Control Tactical Throwing Knives Set is the absolutely best "professional-grade" knife set you will find, and thats why so many martial artists demand our line of high-quality, precision-engineered, & perfectly sized/weighted throwing knives. 

When you receive your knives, you'll immediately notice how comfortable they feel in your hands.. how easy they are to use... and how cool-looking their tactical matte black finish looks in your hand. 

No need to just carry them around in your hand though, because we ALSO include a super heavy duty black nylon wrist sheath for each storage, transport, and use. 

If you've ever owned an Under Control Tactical product, you'll immediately know that you can feel super confident that your new throwing knives are built to the highest standards of quality & durability, not like many of our competitors "cheap" models, that can wear out quickly and become highly-erratic in their flight patterns over time. 

Don't risk it by purchasing an inferior product! Only trust the ORIGINAL Under Control Tactical brand of Kunai throwing knives. 

We're so sure that you'll love your new Under Control throwing knives that you'll want to buy more than one set!
feature_bullets: HIGHEST-QUALITY & PROFESSIONAL GRADE - The Under Control Tactical Throwing Knives Set is the #1 rated throwing knives available on the market for professional martial arts & competition use & all-around "ninjas". Bar none. Built in the authentic Kunai knife tradition.

EASIEST-TO-USE & CARRY - These 5.5" throwing knives weigh only 1.1 oz each and are the perfect size for throwing competitions and martial arts use. Want accuracy? These knives include super sharp blades and precision-engineered shapes that allow them to slice through the air with ZERO wind resistance, so you'll be right on target, every time!

INCLUDES EVERYTHING YOU NEED AND MORE - When you order our #1 rated throwing knives you'll receive everything you need to start practicing in the next 2 minutes! You'll receive 6 super-sharp throwing blades + an awesome black nylon wrist sheath for easy use & convenient storage.

THERE'S NO COMPARISON TO OUR THROWING KNIVES - Compare our knives to hibben, budk, jack ripper, tomahawk, cold steel, naruto, united cutlery, scorpian, sog, and others, and you'll quickly see why so many people choose the Under Control Tactical Throwing Knives Set.

100% TOTAL & COMPLETE SATISFACTION GUARANTEE! - We stand behind our products and we know you're going to love them. That's why we offer a 100% Satisfaction Guarantee on All of Our Products. Shop with Absolute & Complete Confidence that you're making a very smart decision! Support our small family business, not the big nameless & faceless corporations!
